product_name: Look KeO Easy Plus Bike Pedals
long_description: If you're considering trying clipless pedals for the first time, the Look KeO Easy Plus pedals are easier than other clipless pedals to get in and out of, helping you pedal with confidence.
short_description: If you're considering trying clipless pedals for the first time, the Look KeO Easy Plus pedals are easier than other clipless pedals to get in and out of, helping you pedal with confidence.
